name: The Mean Green 2
summary:
The first 3 maps saw you fighting against Imps, Sergeants and Demons with only the Shotgun, Chaingun and the Rocket Launcher. This time they are cranked up to 11 and you're gonna get bigger guns. But also a whole lot of beefier meat to aim them at! You are the Mean Green and you are about to bully the crap out of this strange world!
The levels are medium sized and sets the player in an abstract semi realistic hellish tech setting.
